pageSetting.title: 行员中间业务收入导入

column.name: kmh
column.annotate: 请输入代号： 20029901 ATM手续费收入 20120501 短信服务业务收入 20120502 理财业务收入 20120503 电子银行业务收入 20120504 网上银行业务收入 20120508 电话银行业务收入 20170501 代理基金业务收入 20180502 代收代付业务收入 20180504 POS手续费收入 20181002 代理保险业务收入

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.hydh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_hy h where rtrim(t.hydh)=rtrim(h.hydh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'收入项目代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.kmh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'收入项目代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from csb_dmms ms where lower(ms.dmmc)=lower('ZJYWSRKM') and rtrim(t.kmh)=rtrim(ms.dmz)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计年月输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMM!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tjrq,'yyyyMM')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'中间业务收入输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.srje)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.srje,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'中间业务收入输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.srje)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.tjrq=(select sjw.ym from csb_sjw sjw where sjw.tjrq=cast(t.tjrq||'01' as integer)) where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)'||(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS')||'！' where cast(t.tjrq as integer)<(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp temp set error=error||'导入的同一机构下的行员中间业务收入合计必须小于该机构会计总数结果！' where exists( select 1 from ( select distinct t.tjrq as tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,t.kmh,(coalesce(kmzz.kmye,0)) as kmye from hyzjywsrdr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=t.hydh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and t.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join jxdx_kmzz_$sysdate_yyyy$ kmzz on kmzz.jgdh=jg.jgdh and kmzz.zzrq=t.tjrq and kmzz.kmh=t.kmh where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ ) a inner join ( select tjrq,jgkhdxdh,kmh,sum(srje) as srje from( select t.tjrq as tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,t.kmh,sum(t.srje) as srje from hyzjywsrdr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=t.hydh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and t.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by t.tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,t.kmh union all select cast(sg.tjrq as char(8)) as tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,sg.kmh,sum(sg.srje) as srje from sglr_hyzjywsr sg inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=sg.khdxdh and sg.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq where not exists( select 1 from hyzjywsrdr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=t.hydh where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and hy.khdxdh=sg.khdxdh and t.tjrq=sg.tjrq and t.kmh=sg.kmh ) group by sg.tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,sg.kmh ) group by tjrq,jgkhdxdh,kmh ) b on a.tjrq=b.tjrq and a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh and a.kmh=b.kmh and b.srje>a.kmye inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.jgkhdxdh=a.jgkhdxdh and a.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=jgcy.khdxdh where a.tjrq=temp.tjrq and a.kmh=temp.kmh and hy.hydh=temp.hydh ) and temp.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGLR_HYZJYWSR tar ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=tar.TJRQ and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.kmh =tar.KMH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzjywsrdr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select tjrq,hydh,kmh from hyzjywsrdr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by tjrq,hydh,kmh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.tjrq=dr.tjrq and t.hydh=dr.hydh and t.kmh=dr.kmh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE hyzjywsrdr_temp ( tjrq varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , kmh varchar(100) , srje varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyzjywsrdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyzjywsrdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,kmh,srje,khdxdh,error from hyzjywsrdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,kmh,srje,khdxdh,error from hyzjywsrdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,kmh,srje,khdxdh,error from hyzjywsrdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGLR_HYZJYWSR(TJRQ,KHDXDH,KMH,SRJE,CZR,CZSJ) select cast (t.tjrq as INTEGER),KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH, t.kmh ,cast (t.srje as DECIMAL(25,4)),'$login_hydh$',F_GET_SYSTIME() from hyzjywsrdr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHDX_HY0.HYDH=cast (t.hydh as VARCHAR(20))
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGLR_HYZJYWSR tar where exists(select 1 from hyzjywsrdr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=tar.TJRQ and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.kmh=tar.KMH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
